name: Rescue Operations
description:
Can you rescue them?

A space cat lands on a high cliff, a caveman comes out from nowhere up in the sky; our rescue members are on the way! 
Tap each rescue members to assign different missions, activate the hidden gears and bring them down to the earth!

Controls

Left click to switch characters and move
Right click to pick or drop objects
Space to rotate the scene
Esc to exit
